org.coniks.coniks_server

Class ServerOps

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_server.ServerOps

  • public class ServerOps
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements all operations done by a CONIKS server necessary for a CONIKS client to perform the consistency checks. These include generating data binding proofs and signed tree roots (STR).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerOps() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RootNode buildFirstEpochTree(java.util.PriorityQueue<> pendingQ, byte[] initRootHash, long ep)
      Builds the Merkle prefix tree for the first epoch after intializing the server's namespace with the pending registrations in pendingQ, the initial epoch's root hash initRootHash and the new epoch epoch ep.
      static RootNode buildNextEpochTree(java.util.PriorityQueue<> pendingQ, RootNode curRoot, long ep, int epInt)
      Builds the Merkle prefix tree for the next epoch after with the pending registrations in pendingQ, the current epoch's root node curRoot, the current epoch ep, and the epoch interval epInt.
      static C2SProtos.AuthPath generateAuthPathProto(UserLeafNode uln, RootNode root)
      Generates the authentication path protobuf message from the root node root to the user leaf node uln.
      static byte[] generateSTR(RootNode rn)
      Generates the STR from the root node rn.
      static UserTreeBuilder startBuildInitTree(byte[] prevRootHash, long ep)
      Builds a Merkle prefix tree consisting of only a root node with the previous root hash prevRootHash for epoch ep.

    • Method Detail

      • generateSTR

        public static byte[] generateSTR(RootNode rn)
        Generates the STR from the root node rn.
        Returns:
        The STR as a byte[], or null in case of an error.

      • generateAuthPathProto

        public static C2SProtos.AuthPath generateAuthPathProto(UserLeafNode uln,
                                       RootNode root)
        Generates the authentication path protobuf message from the root node root to the user leaf node uln.
        Returns:
        The C2SProtos.AuthPath protobuf message or null upon failure.

      • startBuildInitTree

        public static UserTreeBuilder startBuildInitTree(byte[] prevRootHash,
                                 long ep)
        Builds a Merkle prefix tree consisting of only a root node with the previous root hash prevRootHash for epoch ep. This tree "skeleton" is used when initializing the server's namespace.
        Returns:
        The UserTreeBuilder set up for building the intial Merkle prefix tree.

      • buildFirstEpochTree

        public static RootNode buildFirstEpochTree(java.util.PriorityQueue<> pendingQ,
                           byte[] initRootHash,
                           long ep)
        Builds the Merkle prefix tree for the first epoch after intializing the server's namespace with the pending registrations in pendingQ, the initial epoch's root hash initRootHash and the new epoch epoch ep.
        Returns:
        The RootNode for the first epoch after initializing the server's namespace or null in case of an error.

      • buildNextEpochTree

        public static RootNode buildNextEpochTree(java.util.PriorityQueue<> pendingQ,
                          RootNode curRoot,
                          long ep,
                          int epInt)
        Builds the Merkle prefix tree for the next epoch after with the pending registrations in pendingQ, the current epoch's root node curRoot, the current epoch ep, and the epoch interval epInt.
        Returns:
        The RootNode for the next epoch or null in case of an error.
